name: The Witcher: Of Flesh and Flame Part 2
summary: After arriving in an enigmatic location by mistake, and being forced to hide their identities, Geralt and Dandelion find themselves faced with an impossible task. Concurrently, Geralt's attention is drawn to a series of strange episodes surrounding the King's concubines. Will the duo be able to solve the palace's dilemma, as well as their own, and secure their safety and freedom?
info:
• 册数: 1
  • 话数: 1
  • 作者: CD Projekt RED、Aleksandra Motyka
  • 出版社: Dark Horse Comics
  • 作画: Marianna Strychowska
  • 发售日: January 23, 2019
